title: Watering Schedule
description: Most plants prefer consistent watering. Check soil moisture before watering.

title: Light Requirements
description: Place plants according to their light needs - bright indirect for most tropicals.

title: Humidity Control
description: Mist plants regularly or use a humidifier for tropical species.

title: Pruning Tips
description: Remove dead leaves and trim overgrown stems to encourage new growth.

title: Fertilizing Guide
description: Feed during growing season (spring/summer) with balanced fertilizer.

title: Pest Prevention
description: Inspect regularly for pests and treat immediately with neem oil if needed.
